images.copyright: Lantern floating ceremony, Ala Moana Beach Park, Honolulu, Hawaii (© Naomi Hayes of Island Memories Photography/Getty Images)
images.title: Honoring the fallen
images.caption: Memorial Day
images.copyrightonly: © Naomi Hayes of Island Memories Photography/Getty Images
images.desc: On Memorial Day, we honor the brave men and women who sacrificed their lives serving in the US military. People mark the day in different ways by attending parades, laying flags or flowers on the graves of fallen soldiers, and participating in community events.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
